oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design and synthesis of spiro-heterocycles by ring-closing metathesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
DEB, AC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: amino-acid derivatives
enyne metathesis
olefin metathesis
catalytic metathesis
organic-synthesis
tic derivatives
annulation
metathesis
spirocycles
1.3-dicarbonyl compound
spiro-annulation
meldrum's acid
barbituric acid
tetronic acid
pyrazolone
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthesis of diverse spiro-heterocyclic compounds via the ring-closing (RCM) metathesis approach is described. Specifically, synthesis of various derivatives of barbituric acid, Meldrum's acid, tetronic acid and thiotetronic acid are described by RCM approach.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 47(7), 1120-1134
